thread.title: TES
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by TES

author: TES
title: TES
text: I had some newspapers I wanted to frame and knew that my skills in making my own mats would likely result in me spending way too much money for a bad product. I had looked on line for the combination of custom frames with custom mats and it seemed a bit extravagant. So, I got a standard frame that was about the right size and planned to order custom mats instead. I wanted the mats to match some other items in a similar collection and the variety of colors and options available led to a great result. And I think I got the mats in about 4 days from the day I ordered! Amazingly fast! They look great! I'm very pleased!
